meanings.definition: Of or relating to an exhibition or display.
meanings.sent1: The exhibitory art gallery showcased beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent2: The museum's exhibitory collection attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitory fashion show featured unique designs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an exhibitory beacon of joy.
meanings.sent5: The exhibitory fireworks lit up the night sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The exhibitory signs guided visitors through the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The exhibitory banners highlighted the event's sponsors.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitory movie posters caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was an exhibitory expression of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The exhibitory neon lights illuminated the street with a festive glow.

meanings.sent1: Her exhibitory gestures revealed her excitement.
meanings.sent2: The exhibitory behavior of the peacock impressed onlookers.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitory dance moves entertained the audience.
meanings.sent4: His exhibitory storytelling captivated the children.
meanings.sent5: The exhibitory colors of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
